title: ✅ Basic Cube
description: Basic cube with orbit controls, react-three-fiber and leva controls.

title: ✅ Physics Cube
description: Basic cube applied with physics from the cannon package.

title: ✅ Physics Experiment
description: Little physics experiment using Cannon, animations and textures.

title: ✅ Imported 3D Object
description: An imported model of a realistic brain mesh with materials and textures.

title: ✅ Imported Animation
description: A scene with an imported and converted FBX model that includes textures and animations.

title: ✅  FPV Example
description: A simple scene where you can walk around and jump on boxes with default FPV controls.

title: ✅ Ambient Sound Stereo
description: A simple scene where you can walk around and listen to the sound of a stereo ambient sound

title: ❌  Dynamic Scene Loading
description: Walk through a portal and you will land in a new dynamically loaded scene.

title: ❌ WebXR Controls
description: Same example as before but this time with virtual reality controls.

title: ❌ Dynamic Audio & Lights
description: Same example as before but with dynamic audio and lights objects.

title: ❌ Forest & Tamina Block-In
description: The two scenes imported from the Unreal Engine with FPV controls.
